ModMetaData.name: Storage Search
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod allows you to search by name in storage filter tab. Original A12 version by meonester. Updated for A15 by Killface.
As of 2016-09-28, this mod also - allows apparel to be searched by name in the edit window - sorts the apparel production bills by bodypart
